page.title: 20DOG TRAINING
page.content:
The Boston Dog Training Association meet twice a week in Frampton Old Primary School which is rented from Frampton Charities. One night there are two obedience classes and on the other a ring craft class. On most weekends dogs are entered in shows. At the end of the year internal competitions are held. Puppies are accepted from the age of 6 months. All dogs have to be vaccinated. The membership is around 100.
{Contributors} Jeanne Allen, Bill Castle, Margaret Collingwood, Peter Copeland, Joan Deane, Joe Dellicott, Rosemary Hutchinson, Joan Lawrence, Ann Pilbeam, Marie Sharpe, Jill Smith.
